channel.title: motivation on Huy Le
channel.description: Recent content in motivation on Huy Le

item.title: You Are My Source
item.description: It’s surprising how often You come to the rescue! Just when I am ready to checkout and give in, You deliver, time and time again! It has been so consistent that my hope grows in You with each new day. And I thank you for that. For when trouble comes my way… I know You will deliver!

item.title: Keep Your Head Up
item.description: Some times we all look forward/down too much, keep your head up and you’ll be surprised. This is of a small little waterfall that feeds into Hanging Lake!

item.title: Life's Awaiting
item.description: This is of my little cousin from Texas taking on a blue run for her first time being on the slope. She’s a fast learner and got down with minimal damages!

item.title: Long Way Home
item.description: This is a scene from Hanging Lake. This was taken on the Dead Horse trail.. After hiking this trail, we found out why it was named the Dead Horse. And no.. there was no dead horse at the end of the trail, it was more of.. a trail that had steep loose jagged rocks that was nearly impossible to go up and was impossible to go back down. The best part was that the trail stopped and there was no clear path.
